methods.MethodName: Create a new export from a recording
methods.Synopsis: Create an export from a (portion of a) recording

parameters.Name: start
parameters.Description: Unix TS of the start of the export (defaults to the recording's start time)

parameters.Name: end
parameters.Description: Unix TS of the end of the export (defaults to the recording's end time)

parameters.Name: destination
parameters.Description: A URL to the directory to export the data to, excluding filename(s)

parameters.Name: isCustomDestination
parameters.Description: If true, then it's a user-defined destination, otherwise it's an internal DataSift destinations

parameters.Name: title
parameters.Description: A descriptive title for the export

parameters.Name: expiry
parameters.Description: Unix TS of when to expire the export

parameters.Name: compression
parameters.Description: One of gzip, bzip2, LZO, SNAPPY

methods.Synopsis: Retry an existing export. Only applicable to exports that have failed

parameters.Name: start
parameters.Description: Unix TS of the start of the export (defaults to the recording's start time)

parameters.Name: end
parameters.Description: Unix TS of the end of the export (defaults to the recording's end time)

parameters.Name: destination
parameters.Description: A URL to the directory to export the data to, excluding filename(s)

parameters.Name: isCustomDestination
parameters.Description: If true, then it's a user-defined destination, otherwise it's an internal DataSift destinations

parameters.Name: title
parameters.Description: A descriptive title for the export

parameters.Name: expiry
parameters.Description: Unix TS of when to expire the export

parameters.Name: compression
parameters.Description: One of gzip, bzip2, LZO, SNAPPY

methods.Synopsis: Get a list of the exports for a user's recording. NB: you MUST specify the desired response format in an Accept header (defaults to application/json)

parameters.Name: include_deleted
parameters.Description: Whether to include exports that have been deleted

methods.Synopsis: Gets the current status of an export
Deletes the specified export. The export will be deleted from the datastore, however its meta-data will remain, hidden by default.
Lists all exports for a user irrespective of recording.
List all the columns seen for a particular recording
